218a3(bi): gtsang ba'i gos gon pad+ma'i khar bzhag ste// dbang bskur rim pa 'di bzhin no// dbus kyi bum pa blangs spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod// hUM nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje 'dzin//
218a4(bi): rigs 'dzin bum pa'i lha// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan rigs kyi bu 'di la// rdo rje dbyings nas dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje
218a5(bi): 'chang ba bum pa'i lha// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan rigs kyi bu 'di la// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// hUM/ rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje rgyal// rdo rje rgyal
218a6(bi): ba bum pa'i lha// bud+d+ha rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan 'di la rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// hUM rdo rje 'dzin byed rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje khro rgyal bum pa'i lha// rin
218a7(bi): chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa 'dul phyir skal ldan 'dre/ hUM/ rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje'i thugs// rdo rje 'bar ba bum pa'i lha'i// snang ba mtha' yas dkyil 'khor du
218b1(bi): gdug pa dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// skal ldan 'dre/ rdo rje gsung mchog drag po'i skad// rdo rje drag po bum pa'i lha'i// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa zil gyis
218b2(bi): mnan pa'i phyir// zhal ldan 'dre/ oM badz+ra mu drA a b+hi'iShi ny+tsa d+h+waM/ oM prad+d+ha mu rba a d+hiShish+tsab+h+rUM/ oM shwa mur+tha mA b+hi'i udza/ oM pad+d+ha mu dra a d+hi Shi n+ya hri/ oM karma mA dra ma thi'i sa/
218b3(bi): bzhin du dbang rnams rim pas bskur bar bya'o// de nas de nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// rig pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sgron ma bshad// dbus kyi gtso bo yab yum gyi sbyor
218b4(bi): mtshams nas/ bdud rtsi byang chub sems kyi 'od zer skal ldan de'i spyi gtsug tu thim pas/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// thul gyis bsregs sbyangs te/ mi dmigs pa las
218b5(bi): yub kyi hUM zhes brjod pas/ kho'i rig pa hUM ru bsdus te/ bdag cag yab kyi thugs kha nas/ hUM mthing nag 'dus par bsam ste/ de nas hUM las du mang po yar drangs te/ mgrin pa'i
218b6(bi): yi ge oM la thim par bsam/ rtswa 'di nA A dmar mar gyur te/ sbrul tshogs kyi rta brgyud de/ gsang ba rdo rje'i lam du byung / sems su gyur nas yum gyi mkha' la thim pas/
218b7(bi): byang chub sems su lhor 'od du 'khyil te/ slar byung nas hUM bzhi po la thim pas lus zhu ste/ oM badz+ra ga ru ra tsa le tsa le hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rdo rje rigs kyi khyung du byin gyis
219a1(bi): brlabs so// de nas bud+d+ha rigs kyi bum pa blang ste/ spyi bor bzhag ste gong bzhin du brjod do// ting nge 'dzin ni ma ba yum rnams kyi sbyor 'tshams nas/ gong
219a2(bi): bzhin du 'od 'phros pas/ bsregs sbyangs nas mi dmigs pa la/ yab kyis oM zhes brjod pas/ kho'i rigs pa oM du 'dus te/ yab kyi thugs la'i hUM las 'ub kyis 'dus
219a3(bi): par bsam mo// de nas gong bzhin du brgyud de/ yum gyi mkha' la thim pas/ byang chub kyi sems yum lhor 'od du thig ler 'dril ra phyung ste/ oM du gyur te bzhi po la thim pasa'o//
219a4(bi): du ldem gyis zhu ste/ oM bud+d+ha ga ru Da na zhes bud+d+ha rigs su byin gyis brlab bo// phyogs gsum des 'dra ste shes par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang rdzogs par bskur ro// rim pa las
219a5(bi): kyi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// de nas yang klu'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi longs spyod kyi mchod pa sna tshogs pa phul nas zhus pa/ e ma ho/ ngo mtshar snying
219a6(bi): po'i don spyad pas// lha spyod klong du gyur pa/ bde gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// rang bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings nam mkha' che// gzugs skur sprul nas 'gro ba'i don byed
219a7(bi): pa// dbang rnams rdzogs pas klu rgyal chos kyi rje// bdag cag 'gro ba'i don bgyid pas// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i phyir// tshogs lam byor lam sgom lam rnams// lha spyod
219b1(bi): gnyis med bshad du gsol// ces zhus pas/ klu'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams// bdag gi lha spyod dam pa 'di// las kyi rgyal po bsku
219b2(bi): phyir bshad// 'khor rnams bdag gi bka' la btud// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi 'phrin las thams cad// gsang sngags mdor bsdus te// sku gsung thugs kyi gsal byed
219b3(bi): sgron mar bshad pa 'di bzhin no// rang sems gsal bas kun tu dmigs// ye shes snying po'i ngo bo 'di skad brjod// b+h+rUM/ nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos nyid
219b4(bi): chos sku che// rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje snying po rig pa sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying po 'chang la rdo rje rgyal zhes sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//
219b5(bi): rdo rje ye shes sangs rgyas che zhes/ chos nyid rang byung rgyal pos gsungs// rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje skur sprul pa// rdo rje khro bo khro bo che// rdo rje 'bar ba'i thugs sprul pa// rdo rje 'bar
219b6(bi): ba 'bar ba che// rdo rje gsung mchog rab spogs pa// rdo rje drag po drag shul che// ye shes snying po rang byung khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs// rdo rje lus la rdo rjes brgyan// rdo rje 'jigs pa
219b7(bi): 'jigs pa che// rdo rje'i baspul ga re nas// rdo rje khro bo chung 'bum phrag stong du sprul// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// zhes rdo rje kun tu 'jigs pas gsungs// de ltar
220a1(bi): rang sems gsal dmigs na// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la 'dud// ce gsang bdag phyag na rdo rjes gsungs// rdo rje'i gshog pa
220a2(bi): nam mkha' gcod ces pa nas// rdo rje 'joms pa 'joms pa che// zhes pa ni klu'i rgyal pos bstod pa'o// de ltar yon tan bstod pa na// bskal pa 'bum gyi sdig sgrib sbyang // zhes
220a3(bi): thugs rje chen pos bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i phyir// rtsa ba las kyi sgron ma 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' gzhi la snying po lam//
220a4(bi): snying po 'bras bur bshad// 'dzin pa las kyi rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje sku la snying po thugs// rdo rje 'chang ba gsang sngags kun gyi bdag por bshad// rdo rje rgyal ba snying po rang byung
220a5(bi): ye shes so// de bzhin rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtsa ba byang chub sems su bsgrub ces dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas de nyid yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyu 'bras nyid
220a6(bi): kyi don bshad pa// nam mkha' rgyu la snying po rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi 'bras bur gsungs// rdo rje 'chang ba snying po byang chub sems su bshad// de bzhin don ldan rnal 'byor pas/
220a7(bi): ma bgrod shugs kyis sa rnams non// bya ba med pa rnal 'byor cha// kun tu chub pas rnam par rol// gnyis su med pas bdag nyid mchog dang ldan// zhes gsungs so//
220b1(bi): mchog dang ldan pas rnal 'byor pas// nam mkha' skye med chos nyid de bzhin nyid du sgom// snying po thugs rje kun tu sgom// gsal la rtog pa med par sgom// rdo rje snying po rang byung
220b2(bi): 'dus ma byas// rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra// zhes gsungs/ rgyu nyid snying po mthing nag hUM du shar// zhes rang byung rdo rje snying pos gsungs// rig pa byang chub sems kyi zer//
220b3(bi): phyogs su 'phro zhing kun tu sdud ces dpal kun tu bzang pos bshad// ye shes snying po hUM gi 'od zer las// r-i yaM khaM kyis bsregs sbyangs te// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste//
220b4(bi): rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam yin// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum por chags// yi ge lam ni 'phro 'du las// de stengs ri rab mchod rten las// rin chen lnga rgyu las grub ste// bum
220b5(bi): pa yid bzhin shing dang 'khor los brgyan// longs spyod phun sum tshogs par 'ong // zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// kha dog gling dang mu khyud rnams// chos gzhung spyi
220b6(bi): dang mthun par bsam// mchod rten bum pa'i khong seng du// yi ge 'bum gyi 'phro 'du las// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gser gyi 'khor lo rtsabs brgyad zangs kyi mu
220b7(bi): khyud can// rin chen mu khyud bzhi'i gru chad ldan// sgo rnams sgo bzhi sgo rkang bum pa rtswa babs bum pa rigs// rin po ches brgyan pa ste// rgya khyon yid kyis 'khyud tshad do// de nas
221a1(bi): yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyal chen seng ge gsal ba'i khri stengs su// badz+ra ar+ya tsaHmaHla/ badz+ra sUr+ya tsaHmuN+Dal/ badz+ra pad+ma maHla hUM zhes brjod pas/
221a2(bi): rdo rje snying po zhugs par bsam// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'gro 'du yis// las gnyis rdzogs te 'od du zhu ba las/ oM badz+ra ga ru ra tsa le tsA la hUM zhes brjod pas/ bdag nyid
221a3(bi): 'jigs byed rdo rje ga ru DA/ 'khor dang bcas par gsal bskyed de// 'di skad brjod de gsal bar dmigs// rdo rje snying po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje snying po rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje snying po rdo rje
221a4(bi): rgyal// rdo rje snying po 'jigs byed rang byung khro bo'i sku zhes brjod de// bdag nyid chen por rab dmigs so// de nas rang byung ye shes kyi sku la 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM/ nam mkha
221a5(bi): snying po rdo rje 'dzin// chos mu skye med thugs su chud pa'i rtags// gnyis med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM/ rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'chang // ye shes snying po 'du 'bral med
221a6(bi): ba'i rtags// ma'i gyur gsu rung 'khrul pa phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje snying po 'chang bas rdo rje rgyal// ngan song gnas nas thar pa thob pa'i rtags// rdo rje sangs rgyas bde gshegs sku
221a7(bi): la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje sku// dug gsum rtsad nas chod pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje 'jigs byed khro rgyal chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje 'ab rab
221b1(bi): rdo rje thugs// dug lnga bsregs pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje bdud 'joms 'bar ba'i skul phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i gsung mchog drag po'i gsung // snang srid zil
221b2(bi): gyis gnon pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje drag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje sku la rdo rjes rab brgyan pa// rdo rje'i sku la bcad du med pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje bsam gtan
221b3(bi): sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje ba spu nya ga re nas// khro chung 'bum phrag stong du 'gyed pa ni// gdon bgegs 'byung po sgrol ba' rtags dang ldan// rdo rje gzi brjid chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//
221b4(bi): rdo rje gshog pas nam mkha' khyab par gcod pa ni// gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje mkha' lding chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i lcags sder bcu pa yis//
221b5(bi): rgya mtsho'i gting nas gdug pa 'dzin pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje ri 'bebs rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje'i lcags mchu chen po rngams pa yis// gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul ba'i rtags dang ldan//
221b6(bi): rdo rje gru 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i mche ba spu gri gtsigs pa ni// gdug pa rtsa nas gcod pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje klu krol sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje spyan mig
221b7(bi): me dpung 'bar ba ni// gdug pa'i che ba 'joms pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje dug sel sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i rwa gnyis dbyings su gsor ba ni// chos nyid yum dang
222a1(bi): dbyings su sbyor ba'i rtags// rdo rje thabs mchog sbrul phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i nor bu gtsug na brgyan pa ni// 'gro ba yongs kyi sdug bsngal sel
222a2(bi): ba'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje byad bkrol sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje snying po me dpung 'bar ba ni// bdud rnams 'joms pa'i rtags dang ldan// rdo rje klu 'joms 'bar ba'i
222a3(bi): sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar don dang ldan par bstod pa ni// byang chub sa thob par nga yis bshad// gdug pa klu'i snying khrag 'joms zhes nga yis bshad// byang chub kyi
222a4(bi): me long ste// lha byed rig pa'i rgyal po'o// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma/ gsang sngags snying po mdor bsdus kyi le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// //
222a5(bi): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyir// gsang sngags kun gyi yang mdzod// rig pa gsal byed sgron ma bshad// rgyu 'bras rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag/
222a6(bi): nyid chen por rab dmigs te// tshogs bsags las rigs skabs 'di gzhug/ ye shes bya khyung 'khor bcas la// mchod bstod 'phrin las rdzogs pa dang // ye she/
222a7(bi): gsang byed 'di bzhin sgom// yang dag nyid du rang dbang bskur// bdag nyid chen por bskyed pa yi// spyi bor sa las bdag po bzhi// rigs bzhi dag tu bskyed par bya// rdo rje sbu gum
222b1(bi): bsams te// rig pa'i rgyal mos dbang bskur bya// mgrin par ya las ra phul// klu bdud dregs pa chen por bsgom// thugs mchog rdo rje'i me dpung du// gzhal yas khang du byin
222b2(bi): gyis brlabs// nyi zla pad+ma'i ge sa ra la// hA snying po mthing nag hUM cig bsam// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du las// thugs dam rgyud bskul 'gro ba'i bsnyen bskur las//
222b3(bi): tshur 'dus 'od du zhu ba las// phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur// de nyid gong bzhin 'od du zhu ba las// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje 'chang ba bskyed de// sku mdog 'gyu
222b4(bi): ba med pa'i rtags su mthong nag/ don cig gis thabs cir yang mdzad pa'i rtags su/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// ye shes khro bos gang kyang 'dul ba'i rtags su/ g.yon pa sdigs
222b5(bi): mdzub thugs kar 'dzin pa/ khams gsum dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags su/ dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes pa/ gdug pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags su/ spyan
222b6(bi): gsum sdang mig khro gnyer sdang mig babrog nas lta ba/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rtags su/ smin ma ag tshoms ma sdug phyogs bcur 'phro/ khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i
222b7(bi): rtags su/ zhal bgrang mche ba gtsigs nas/ hUM dang phaT kyi nga ro drag po 'don pa/ gdug pa thams cad bsgral ba dang / khro bo thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rtags su/ ljags
223a1(bi): 'dril mche ba'i gseb nas gnam lcags me 'bar thog tu 'bebs pa/ dur khrod kyi ma mo thams cad 'bangs su 'khol ba'i rtags su/ sku stod glang chen gyi
223a2(bi): ko rlon mi lpags mchog gis brgyan pa/ gnod sbyin dregs pa thams cad bran du 'khol ba'i rtags su/ sku smad dpa' bo stag gi sham thabs rin chen sa ga tis brgyan pa/
223a3(bi): gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul ba'i rtags su/ sbrul nag gis brgyan pa/ dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags su/ mi mgo rkam rlon tshar gsum gyis se ra la kha ru brgyan
223a4(bi): pa/ rdo rje srin po bran du 'khol ba'i rtags su/ rdo rje 'phreng ba skan cha mgur chu do shal dpung rgyan la/ snang srid ma lus thugs la gsal ba'i rtags su/ zhabs gyad kyi
223a5(bi): dor thabs nyi zla'i steng na bzhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yid kyis bsregs pa'i rtags su/ bskal pa me ri'i nang na gtum khro drag shul che ba/ rdo rje dang ldan pa'i
223a6(bi): mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rje/ zhes gsungs// de ltar thugs su gsal bsgoms na/ ye shes thugs kyis bdud rnams bsreg/ rang byung mthu yis srid pa
223a7(bi): gsum kyang sgrol bar byed// ces gsungs/ dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// denas yang dag bshad bya ba// ye shes skang po thugs kyi dbang bskur 'di bzhin te//
223b1(bi): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs ka ru// thugs mchog ye shes rtse snga pa// cha gang me ltar 'bar ba'i gong seng na// a las zla ba/ ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor me long chung tshad tsam gyi kha ru/
223b2(bi): / las pad+ma'i ge sa ra la/ chos sgyu skye ba med pa'i rtags su/ yi ge a dkar po las ye shes sems dpa migs/ me shes snying po ye nas dag cing rgyas pa'i rtags su/ gru mdog dkar po gser gyi
223b3(bi): gshog pa can/ ye shes kyi snying po 'phrin las drag po ye nas mdzad pa'i rtags su/ mchu sder thugs las grub pa/ drag po dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags su/ lcags dang spyan
223b4(bi): rtsa dam ra ba/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags su/ rdo rje rA gnyis rab tu brjod pa/ thugs mchog cir yang dgongs pa'i rtags su/ yid bzhin nor bu gtsug na 'bar ba
223b5(bi): ye shes snying po thugs su gzigs pa'i rtags su/ gra ser mig 'khyil pa/ thugs rjes kun la gzigs pa'i rtags su/ khro gnyer glog tu 'khrug pa/ gdug pa thabs kyis
223b6(bi): 'dul ba'i rtags su/ sbrul zhal du gsol ba/ ye shes sku la gcad du med pa'i rtags su/ lus la rdo rjes gtams pa/ de ltar tshon gang gsal dmigs te/ ye shes thugs
223b7(bi): mchog 'gyur ba med pa'i rtags su/ thugs ka rdo rje gro rgan tsam/ ye shes kyi thugs la gsal 'grib med pa'i rtags su/ ma las nyi ma'i gdan sran ma leb pa tsam/ rig
224a1(bi): pa byang chub sems kyi snying po ye shes rang byung 'phel ba'i rtags su/ snying po hUM yungs 'bru tsam/ snying po thabs shes rab tu 'brel ba'i rtags su/ ki zla
224a2(bi): kha sbyor gyi bar na snying po 'od zer du 'phro ba/ byang chub sems kyi snying po la cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i rtags su/ rdo rje bum pa na gnas pa/ byang chub kyi snying po thugs rje ye shes dang ldan
224a3(bi): pa'i rtags su/ rtsa sngags ga ru Da 'bru dgus phyogs mtshams su bskor ba// thugs rje byang chub kyi sems kyi skang rje byams dang ldan pa'i rtags su/ ye shes kyi 'od zer rnam pa
224a4(bi): lngas bskor ba/ ye shes rnam pa lnga dang snying po byang chub kyi sems// dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags su/ oM dang 'brel te bsnyen pa'o// ye shes zang thal du 'char ba'i
224a5(bi): rtags su/ 'od zer rnam pa lnga lus kyi yan lag rtsa ru 'brel nas byang chub/ sems kyi sgo phyi nang du gsal ba ye shes kyi snying po cagri pas gzugs sku sna tshogs su 'char ba'i
224a6(bi): rtags su/ 'od zer rnam pa lnga la dog ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kun la khyab pa'i rtags su/ zer phyogs bcur 'phro yi ni rgyug pa/ thig le
224a7(bi): byang chub la 'dus pa'i rtags su/ ngo bo gsal la rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ thig le bde stong du rtogs pa'i rtags su thig le 'od kyis khyab pa/ de ltar snying po ye shes
224b1(bi): gsal dmigs na// byin brlabs shugs kyis sa bcu lam lnga bgrod// snying rje'i las kyis pha rol sgrol// zhes rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// de phyogs rnal 'byor dmigs
224b2(bi): pa gsal bar sgom// bying rgod rlung gis mkhyer na// thig le zhar la skye zhes gsungs// thig le skyes pas gzung 'dzin shugs kyis 'gag/ gzung 'dzin 'gags na bde ba kun tu snyoms/
224b3(bi): desteltar grol na sangs rgyas yin// zhes rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs// rig pa gsal byed smon ma'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// rtsa ba byang chub kyi sgron ma 'di/
224b4(bi): rig pa stobs su gyur pa cig dang phrad par shog/ de nas de nyid bshad bya'i phyir// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi rig pa 'di bzhin gsal// de ltar ye shes gsal bsgoms tshe// srid pa
224b5(bi): lta byed rgyal po ste// thugs kyi me long gces par gsungs// ye shes thugs kyi me long gsal byed 'di// thugs rje nyi ma' snying po 'dra// las kyi rgyal po de nyid sgrub pa'i phyir//
224b6(bi): mthong lam 'phro 'dra'i byin rlabs bshad// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum nus// tshogs bsogs sna'i rje mchog gis bskyed// lam gyi yan lag rdzogs pa dang // thabs
224b7(bi): kyi yan lag rdzogs zhes gsungs// ye shes thabs kyi rgyal po sgom// ye shes thabs kyi rgyal po las// ye shes thugs kyi shes rab me long 'di bzhin sgom// bya rgod lha
225a1(bi): bu'i sems min pas// rnal 'byor thabs kyi ye shes zang thal rtogs pa yis// shes rab thugs kyi me long dag gsal lha// stobs su gyur pa'i byang chub
225a2(bi): kyis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhal mthong ste// kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams cis kyang snang // gzugs rnams thams cad yang zhes snying po snang ba'i sku// snang
225a3(bi): ba'i gzugs brnyan thams cad kun// de nyid yang dag snying po rang byung rang la sa shar ba yin// dper na lteng ka'i chu dang zla ba chu zla bzhin du shar// thig le byang chub sems
225a4(bi): kyi da pa// bum pa'i mar me lta bu'o// thig la byang chub sems kyi 'od// dper na nyi ma zer gyi la dog bzhin// rang gsal bde gsal kun tu snang // thig la rang sar grol ba'i dge
225a5(bi): za 'og dpe khyim lta bus mtshon// thig la gnyis su med pazhi dpa// nam mkha' bzhin du yongs la khyab// de ltar gnyis su snang ba'i yon tan gzugs brnyan thams cad kun//
225a6(bi): snying po rang las shar ba yin// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// mi g.yo bsam med chos kyi sku// de ltar sku phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po rang la shar ba yin// de
225a7(bi): bzhin de yi ngang las byung // mi g.yo lam bsun chos nyid dang // kun tu bzang po'i thugs dang mnyam// byin rlabs thams cad shu las 'byung // zhes gsungs/ de ltar
225b1(bi): nam zhig rtogs pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams kyang bdag/ bdag nyid thugs la 'dus ces rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// de ltar snying po byang chub mthong ba'i tshe// rtsa ba
225b2(bi): byang chub sems kyi las 'grub ste// 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa thob// ces rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs// gsal byed sgron ma'i le'u stenye spyad pa'o// /
225b3(bi): gsang sngags thugs kyi yang mdzod/ lha spyod dam pa 'di/ skal ldan skyes mchog cig dang phrad par shog/ de nas de nyid bshad pa'i phyir// thar lam byang chub
225b4(bi): sems kyi sgron ma bshad// bdag nyid chen por ra ba dmigs nas// byang chub sems kyis tshogs bsags te// 'phrin las gzhung bzhin bya bar gsungs// thabs
225b5(bi): kyi yan lag rdzogs pa dang // thar lam byang chub 'di bzhin sgom// ye shes thugs kyi snying po las// phyogs bcur 'od 'phros 'jig rten khyab par dmigs// bde gshegs
225b6(bi): thugs mchog mnyes pa phul// 'gro ba yongs kyi sdug bsngal sbyangs// byang chub sems su gyur nas tshur 'dus hUM la thim// thugs kyi dbang thob byin rlabs zhugs par bsam
225b7(bi): las su rung ba'i dbang thob ste// mthing nag 'od zer ba krag dang ldan// thugs kyi dbang thob 'od 'phros te// rdo rje'i ra phrag rgyud phug ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar ston//
226a1(bi): de bzhin rgyun nas gsung mchog pad+ma'i rdo rje nas// gong bzhin 'phro 'dra'i las byas te// tshur 'dus gsung mchog AM la thim// gsung gi dbang thob byin
226a2(bi): rlabs zhugs par bsam// las su rung ba'i dbang thob skye// gsung mchog rdo rje pad+ma rdo rje dmar lag dang // gsung gi dbang thob 'od 'phros pas// rdo rjer phrag rgyud dazug ste/
226a3(bi): nas g.yas nas g.yon du phug/ klad pa drung khang gi rlung du 'od du 'khyil/ tshangs pa'i bug nas gong bzhin du/ 'od kyi rgyud ma chad par phyogs bcu kun tu 'phros pa las/
226a4(bi): gshegs sku mchog mnyes pa phul// 'gro ba yongs kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs// byang chub sems nas tshur 'dus pas// sku mchog ye shes oM du gyur// rgyu'i dbang thob byin rlabs
226a5(bi): zhugs par bsam/ sku gsung thugs las su rung ba'i dbang thob/ snying po hU~M las hUM grangs med pa rdo rje'i ra phrag rgyud rug nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar rnon/ de bzhin rgyud nas
226a6(bi): thugs khar gsung gi A la thim pas/ hUM mthing ka aM dmar por gyur/ rdo rje'i ra brag rgyud drug nas/ nas g.yas nas g.yon du phug zhugs/ sku mchog yi ge oM la thim/ aM
226a7(bi): dmar po oM la thim/ oM dkar por gyur nas/ tshangs pa'i bu ga nas gong bzhin du 'od 'phros pa las/ srid pa gsum kyang 'od su sem gyi zhu/ byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi dkar
226b1(bi): dmar du gyur ste// 'jig rten gyi khams kun byang chub kyi bdud rtsis khengs par dmigs/ tshur 'dus bdag nyid gsos sbyangs te/ bdag nyid bdud rtsi byang chub sems su
226b2(bi): gyur pas/ de nas hUM zhes brjod pas/ sems nyid mngon du gyur te/ 'od zer rnam pa lnga la gong bzhin du 'phros te/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa las// bdud rtsi nyid la nyid sbyar te/
226b3(bi): bdud rtsi nyid la sems nyid byang chub thig le 'od du 'dril// snying po gnyis su med pa yis// snang srid rgyal ba'i zhing kham su gyur te/ dkyil 'khor lha dang lha mo dang / gtso dang 'khor
226b4(bi): dang bcas pa dmigs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu bzang po'i zhing khams su lta'o// dper na za 'og gi be khyim mam/ nyi zer gyi rdul cha bzhin du dmigs so// de ltar
226b5(bi): ye shes kyi lha tshogs gsal ba'i dus su/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyu la dri med dag pas// dri yang dag pa'i lha spyod dag par mthar phyin pa'o// snying po byang chub sems kyi snang ba kun dang
226b6(bi): dus gsum du sbyar bas/ snang srid thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor du gsal bar rtogs pas/ mahA yo ga'i lha spyod mthar phyin pa'o// snying po byang chub kyi sems ye nas stong
226b7(bi): gzhi dag las/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir// a nu yo ga'i sgod skyod mthar phyin pa'o// de'i tshe snying po byang chub kyi sems za 'og gi be khyim bzhin du thugs rje ma 'dres la yongs
227a1(bi): su rdzogs pas/ rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga mthar phyin pa'o// de'i tshe snying po byang chub kyi sems thig le bde sbyong bdag med du gsal bas/ chos kyi sku la
227a2(bi): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de ldan rnal 'byor don spyod na// gsang sngags rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// mthar phyin byang
227a3(bi): chub sems kyi sgron ma/ las kyi rgyal po'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// / 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen thugs kyi yang mdzod gsal ba'i smon
227a4(bi): ma 'di/ rgyal po ba su d+ha ra'i thugs su rgyud/ mtsho ma dros pa'i 'gram/ ri spos ri ngad ldan gyi rtsa ra/ shing chen dpag bsam ljon shing gi rtsa bar klu'i rgyal po'i dngos
227a5(bi): grub thob ste/ gsang sngags kyi lha spyod 'dis gtan la dbab pa'o// de nas de nyid yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsa ba las kyi rgyal po chos nyid a la bstim pa'i phyir// rtsa
227a6(bi): pa byang chub sems kyi sgron ma bshad// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum nas// byang chub sems kyi yan lag rdzogs byas te// snying po byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu// mthar phyin
227a7(bi): rgyu skye med 'di bzhin nom// ye shes thugs kyi snying po las/ byin brlabs 'phro 'du 'od bzhin dmigs// snang srid thams cad byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// thams
227b1(bi): cad lha'i phyag rgyar shes shing rtogs pa las// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa rdzogs par 'bul// yengs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos skur gsal ba dang bying med rgyun du
227b2(bi): bzlas// ngang la rgyun du gnas pa/ bde gshegs rdugs te sbyang mi dgos// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// de nas de nyid bshad pa'i phyir// ye shes snying po thugs
227b3(bi): kyi snying po las// gong bzhin thugs kyi 'phro 'du ste// snang srid thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin du// dmar phyam gyis zhu bar bsam// de las dbang gi lha tshogs su gyur te/
227b4(bi): srog gi dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas dbang gi lha tshogs thams cad/ bdag gi sku gsung thugs la 'dus te/ rang bzhin du 'dus thim par bsam// dper na nyi ma'i
227b5(bi): snying po la/ zer phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa bzhin na ma/ chu zla zla ba la 'dus pa bzhin nam/ gzugs brnyan gzugs sku la 'dus pa bzhin du/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
227b6(bi): thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin du gyur nas/ bdag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la gnyis su med par thim par bsam mo// de ltar dbang rims rdzogs pa na// gnyis med byin rlabs
227b7(bi): rangal 'char// sems kyi byin rlabs sna tshogs 'byung // ye dam lha gsal lung ston 'byung // kun tu bzang po'i thugs dang gnyis med gnyis su med pa ston// zhes
228a1(bi): dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas de nyid bshad bya ba// ye shes thugs kyi snying po las// grong bzhin thugs kyi 'phro 'du ste// snang sri
228a2(bi): thams cad drag po'i las su gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i sku gsung thugs la gong bzhin du thim par bsam mo// de nas drag po'i las byas na// rang rig snying po byin
228a3(bi): rlabs can// srid pa gsum yang sgrol bar 'gyur// ye shes thugs kyis bdud rnams bsreg/ rang byung mthu yis srid pa gsum yang sgrol bar nus zhes gsungs// zhes
228a4(bi): dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// de nas de nyid bshad bya ba// ye shes thugs kyi snying po las// gong bzhin thugs kyi 'phro 'du las// snang srid thams cad zhi rgyas kyi las su gyur te//
228a5(bi): ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs la gong bzhin du 'dus par bsam mo// de nas zhes pa'i las byas na// rang rig snying po byin rlabs kyis// mi ro rkam po la bdud rtsi'i zil
228a6(bi): thigs 'byung ba bzhin// zang cig yud kyis shes pa skye// skye ldog rma tshes lta bur bshad// byin rlabs bdud rtsi lta bu yin// kun kyang sos par nga yis bshad// byin rlabs
228a7(bi): shugs kyis sa bcu lam lnga bgrod// rdo rje'i las kyis kha lo bsgral// zhes rdo rje sems dpa' nga yis bshad// de nas de nyid bshad bya ba// ye shes snying po las/ 'gro
228b1(bi): 'du'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med phyir rdzogs rim bu shad// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i phyir// snang srid thams cad snying po rang gi sems// snying po 'du
228b2(bi): 'bral med pa ste// yang dag mtha' ste rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// zhes dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// a ma ho/ chos rnams thams cad rmi lam tshul//
228b3(bi): snang skyong ngo bo nyid kyis dben// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid 'di// dngos por bden par ma gsungs so// sgyu ma'i tshul du skyed pa yin// sgra ming tshig las 'das pa yin//
228b4(bi): rang gi ngo bor bstan du med// 'jig med dbang po'i sa thob pas// bde gshegs sku ste sbyang ma dgos// theg gsum sa bcu mi gnas pa'o// rnal 'byor rdzogs rim
228b5(bi): mchog gi sa// gsang sngags mchog gi spyod pa rnams// rnal 'byor mchog gi mchog 'dod pas// dang po tshags lam bskyed pa nas// ting 'dzin rims 'jug sems rtsal
228b6(bi): sbyang // las su rung ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'phrin las gso bzhin bya bar gsungs// de nas byang sems mthar thug 'di bzhin sgom// snang srid gnyis med rang la bsdu//
228b7(bi): rang sku lha yi nga rgyal kyang // gong bzhin rims kyis bsdu ba ste/ bye tshan la yang mar thim mam// rdo tshan la kha ba bab pa bzhin du bsdu// rdo rje dang snying po yang 'od du zhu/
229a1(bi): aM la thim par bsam/ oM yang hUM yungs 'bru tsam la thim pas/ hUM de ye shes lnga dang ldan te/ snying po de nyid chos sku las/ migams par bya ba'i phyir
229a2(bi): zhabs kyu 'a la bsdu/ 'phel bsdu/ har+tha tshes la bsdu/ zla tshes zlum po thig le can la bsdu/ thig le byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mi snang bar dmigs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus
229a3(bi): na snang srid thams cad chos kyi sku'i ngang du gnas par gyur te/ snang srid thams cad thig le bde stong bdag med du shes par bya'o// de'i tshe byang chub kyi lam mthar phyin to// sku
229a4(bi): gsung 'du 'bral med de rdo rje 'chang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sa la gnas// phyag rgya chen po'i sgyu zhes de la gdags// de la bshad du med do// de la gcad du med do rdo rje rgyal//
229a5(bi): zhes rang bzhin rdo rje sems pas gsungs// de ltar de la spyad par bya zhes// dam tshig chen po nga yis bshad// bya ba byang chub sems kyi sgron ma/ las po'i lha spyod bstan
229a6(bi): pa'i le'u ste sumats+tsha pa'o// / bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// rgya yi skad bsgyur lo ts+tsha'i tshig sbyangs nas// rgyal po ba su b+ha ra'i dgongs pa
229a7(bi): 'di// rin chen snying po gser phul nas// mos gus dad pa'i sgo nas zhus// srog gis btsal kyang 'di don mi rnyed de// las 'phro dag pa cig dang phrad par shog/ dus
229b1(bi): la ba ba na smon lam btsan par shog/ rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rA dza pu ri tan tra ti tsi tsit+ta ya/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po
229b2(bi): mchod rten gyi rgyud thugs yang dag pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje che la thabs mkhas
229b3(bi): pa de 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can gyi don mdzad nas/ shwar phyogs gangs kyi ri bo chen po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzhal yas khang / rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa/ me tog
229b4(bi): sna tshogs dang / bdug smos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi sa brgyan pa/ bkra shis pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis sgra sgrog pa'i gzhal yas khang de ni/ sems cad thams cad la
229b5(bi): tshad med pa khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de yang sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang / byang
229b6(bi): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa mang po dang thabs gcig tu ting nge 'dzin la gnas so// de nas 'dzam
229b7(bi): bu gling gi sems can thams cad bde skying phun sum tshogs pa dang yang ldan/ tshe dang dbang thang yang rgyas/ bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po kun yang nye bar zhi/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan
230a1(bi): pa dUr ba'i dus na/ sgo phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri nag po dgu 'das pa na gangs kyi ri'o// de'i phyi rol na spos kyi ngang ldan pa'i tshu rol na/
230a2(bi): chu zheng lnga bcu dngas pa'i mtsho chen po ma dros pa zhes bya ba/ klu thams cad kyi gnas chen po de na/ klu dang / gnyen dang / sa bdag la sogs pa kun gyi gzhal yas khang bsam
230a3(bi): gyis mi khyab yod do// de rnams kyi dbus na/ rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ phyi nang med pa rin po che dngul gyi rtsigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
230a4(bi): pa dang / rin po che gser gyi brtsig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che phangs kyi brtsig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che lcags kyi brtsig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
230a5(bi): dang / dbus na gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od bar sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i ka gdung can/ chu srin nyi ma'i rgyan pa tang ba/ sbrul dang sbal pa mang po'i mar
230a6(bi): tshags/ rin po che'i gru chad bzhis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che dang / pad+ma rin po che dang / rin po che rin po che dang / 'khor lo rin po che dang / bzhi'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po
230a7(bi): gzhon nu gtum po zhe bya ba sprul pa stong dang ldan pa/ sku'i man ngag las 'bum dang ldan pa/ srid pa gsum dbang du sdud par byed pa/ srid pa gsum dbang du 'gyed par yang byed//
230b1(bi): khams gsum gyi sems can rnams la mdangs dang ldan par byed// mdangs 'phrog par yang byed/ lo tog dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / mgo lcogs rnams smin cing
230b2(bi): rgyas par yang bye da/ 'bri zhing mi smin par yang byed/ skyes pa dang bud med rnams nad tsi tsi dz+wa la dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yam pa la sogs gto//
230b3(bi): bar yang byed/ gso bar yang byed/ 'byung po dang / srin po dang / dur khrod kyi bdag po dang / gnod sbyin ma rungs pa la sogs pa rnams 'joms shing rlag par yang byed/
230b4(bi): rlag cing 'joms par yang mi byed/ klu nang la mthun zhing gtong grogs dang ldan par yang byed/ mi mthun zhing klu nang zas su za bar yang byed/ de lta bu'i glu mi srun pa de/ stobs dang
230b5(bi): ldan pa'i re zhes bya ba// spos kyi ngad du ldan par 'byung ba// gzhal yas rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa// yang rtse yod pa/ nyams dga' ba/ sa pa sel ba// yid du 'ong ba/ me tog/
230b6(bi): rtswa tshogs pa dang yang ldan/ de na rdzu 'phrul ston cing bzhugs so// de nas 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyis kyang / mtsho ma dros pa dang spos ngad ldan pa'i
230b7(bi): ri la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i klu gzhon nu gtum po zhes bya ba/ srid pagasum dbang du sdud pa cig gis sems can thams cad mi bde bar byed do zhes bya ba yang grags so// de nas
231a1(bi): klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu tum po de/ stobs dang rdzu 'phrul yang rgyas par gyur nas/ sems can thams cad la mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'byung / rims
231a2(bi): dang / yams dang / mdza nad dang / 'bras kyi nad dang / phol mig la sogs pa thams cad btong bar byed/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / rtsa ba dang / sman dang /
231a3(bi): mgo lcogs la sogs pa sman par yang bya da/ grong khyer chen po ser skya ru/ ser bas sog ma yang med par byed/ grong khyer chen po ser skya ru skye ba su ma brgyar sad kyis bcud thams
231a4(bi): cad med par yang byas/ rlung sna tshogs gtong bar yang byed/ 'byung po drang ma rungs pa rnams rlag par yang byed/ klu nang zas su za bar yang byed/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi mdangs
231a5(bi): 'phrog par yang byed/ nad ci tsau dzA las zin par yang byed/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig pa la thug/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang bred cing 'dar/ 'jigs shing
231a6(bi): sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang // bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa mdzad pa'i spyan snga ru/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
231a7(bi): 'dzam bu'i gling du klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu gtum po zhes bya ba/ rdzu 'phrul stong dang ldan pa/ sprul pa bye ba dang ldan pa zhig gis sems can rnams kyi srog dang dbugs 'phrog par yang
231b1(bi): byed/ sad dang / ser ba dang / mu ge la sogs pas 'dzam bu gling du bkrag med par gtong / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bred sbyor bar yang byed/ sangs
231b2(bi): rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig par yang byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar bgyi 'tshal na/ ji ltar mkhyen pa dang / thugs rjes gdul bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang /
231b3(bi): ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ma phyag na rdo rje khyod 'jigs shing skrag par ma byed cig/ sngon yang 'jig rten khams su ma rungs
231b4(bi): pa'i khro bo 'am/ gdug pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa la thug pa la/ thugs rje dang byin rlabs kyis thul ba yin gyis/ 'dir yang bran bzhin du thul te
231b5(bi): 'ong bas/ 'khor rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal ma zhan cig ces gsungs nas/ klu'i rgyal po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
231b6(bi): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srid pa gsum yang zhig la khad/ lo tog dang me tog thams cad bskams/ grong khyer chen po ser skyar skye ba lnga brgyar se ra bas
231b7(bi): sog ma man chad med par byas pas thugs rje dang ting nge 'dzin gyis kho'i gnas su gshegs nas gdul 'tshal lo// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal
232a1(bi): pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje legs so// khyod 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu sog ma med kyi khyim du 'deng ngo // ji ltar thul bar byin gyis brlabs zin
232a2(bi): gyis gsungs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor
232a3(bi): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi khyim du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
232a4(bi): glang po che'i lha stangs kyis sbrul nag po ri ri ba tsam cig tu sprul nas/ mdzod spu'i bu ga nas 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phros te sog ma med kyi gnas 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad/
232a5(bi): bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lha stangs kyis kyang bltas/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi sa 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pa yang mthong / bcom ldan 'das klu chen po'i
232a6(bi): gzugs su bzhugs pa yang mthong nas/ kye ma kye ma zhes skrag cing lus zhum ste/ ba spu gyen du 'greng zhing lus 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid ma bzod de/ khro
232a7(bi): gtum pas zil gyis non nas nga'i khyim du dgra gzhan 'ongs pa 'di su zhig yin/ klu chen po dang stobs 'gyed nus pa 'di su zhig yin/ srog dang dbugs rngab cing bza'
232b1(bi): bar bya'o// srog 'phrog par bya'o// dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// nad tsi tsi dz+wa la gtang ba bya'o// ral gri dang gtun shing gi char dbab par bya'o// gan ma lcags kyang dbab
232b2(bi): par bya'o// zhes zer zhing klu'i rgyal po sog ma med khros nas 'khrug par gyur/ khros pas gad mo'i sgra phyung / smin ma dpral bar bsdus/ bzhin bsgyur/ lce dril/
232b3(bi): sgra 'greng / skrag par byed/ lag na mtshon thogs te sgra chen po ca co'i sgra phyung nas/ 'jigs pa chen po glog 'bar ba 'byin cing / sprin nag po chen po las bcom ldan 'das
232b4(bi): kyi steng du gnam lcags dbab par 'dod pas/ glog gi tshogs kyang brdeg par 'dod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khyams pa dang thugs rje gzigs nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po
232b5(bi): lag na rdo rje/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med sdigs shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ldan nas/ sog ma med kyi khyim dang nye bar rdo rje gsor zhing khro
232b6(bi): ba'i sngags 'di brjod cing song ngo // na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ya/ ma b+hU yak+Sha sre nA pa ta ya/ oM tsaN+Da d+ba be ka pa re b+ha/ sa ra sa ra bi ri hu tu tu mu la sa ma ya bi ri/
232b7(bi): hu ru su ru hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha b+ho b+ho pan d+ha nA ga nan d+ha pra ha ra tu/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dza sU ta sU ta/ be'i ra bai'i re/ sa ra sa ra/ ma man+ta su ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaT sA hA/ de nas rig pa'i rgyal
233a1(bi): po gsad bsgrub kyi sngags 'di brjod ma thag tu/ klu'i khyim dang bcas te 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad me 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to// de nas klu'i
233a2(bi): rgyal po sog ma med kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces/ kye phyag na rdo rje dang pa ci'i phyir stobs 'gyed nus/ ngas dbugs rngub pa gcig gis bza' bar bya'o//
233a3(bi): khyod kyi srog kyang dbrog par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon phyag na rdo rje khros 'khrugs zil gyis non nas lus rab tu 'dar zhing khros pa'i gad mo 'byin/ mche
233a4(bi): pa gtsigs/ mig bgrad de/ klu'i rgyal po'i bka' sdod kyig/ yang nga'i rtags gang yin pa ring por ma thogs par bstan par bya'o// nga'i stobs gang yin klu'i rgyal pos ltos shig/
233a5(bi): rdo rje 'bar ba gsor zhing klu'i rgyal po sog ma med la brdeg par 'dod/ bdag gis klu'i stobs dang bcas pa/ bzhon pa dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
233a6(bi): kyis 'di skad ces phyag na rdo rje ha cang yang khro ba'i dbang du ma 'gro bar phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po skrag par byos la/ klu'i rgyal po rnams la ma 'che zhig/ ces bka' stsal pa
233a7(bi): dang / de nas gnod skye na gyi bdag po la ga na rdo n+des/ rdo rje 'ab ra ba ca ge ri khyim la bsnun no// de nas klu'i khyim dum pu ra bcom nas/ rdo rje 'ab ra ba mig ces bya ba khros
233b1(bi): pa'i ming smra sa pa/ s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ nA ga bi d+ha ra na ya hUM hUM phaT sA hA/ sarba sha hUM pra ma na tha ya hUM phaT/ bi ri bi ri swA hA/ kro d+ha na shA ya phaT/ bi da ra na ya phaT/ ma ra ya sa/
233b2(bi): ku la ud swad ka na ya phaT/ sa smin ka ra na ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor klu thams cad 'chi bas
233b3(bi): 'jigs pa byed pa'i mchod pa'i sngags zab mo 'di brjod pa tsam gyis bshad ma thag tu ri dang / brag dang / khyim dang tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad g.yos
233b4(bi): so/ rab nyu g.yos so// 'ur ro// rab tu 'ur ro// chem che ma mo// rab tu chem mo// 'gul ho// rab tu 'gu la ho// de nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'jigs skrag
233b5(bi): ste/ khro ba dang bral te/ snying stor lus 'dar nas/ lus la rdul phyung nas/ snying nas ngo tsha ba dang bcas par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
233b6(bi): gtugs te/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol/ gong du bdag gis gnod sems sngar byas pa brjed par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bshad pa/
233b7(bi): khro bo chen po drag shul chen po'o// gtum po drag po 'jig par bgyid la lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de las ba dag skyabs su gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / bcom
234a1(bi): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ klu'i rgyal po khyod phyag na rdo rje la bzod par gsol cig/ klu'i bdag po khyod sdug bsngal mang po 'byung bar mi 'gyur

234a3(bi): snying 'dul ba dka' zhing / rdo rje mi bzad pa'i gan ma lcags 'bebs/ ri'i char 'bebs/ lo tog rnams 'joms/ sad dang / sprin dang / rlung 'byung ba'i sprin dang /
234a4(bi): glog 'bar ba gtong bar bgyin na/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i phyi ma'i tshe/ phyi ma'i dus na/ sems can mi srun pa rnams kyi ched du me ma mur gyi char 'bebs par
234a5(bi): kye ste mi bgyid de ma lce 'bar ba dang glog 'gyu ba dag gtong bar bgyid na/ ral gre da'/ gtun shing dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung gi char 'bebs par bgyid/

234a7(bi): yang bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar brjod pa tsam dang / dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi lus zhig par 'gyur zhing / klu thams cad
234b1(bi): kyi snying 'gas par 'gyur ba dang / lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis klu thams cad dum bu lnga bcur chad pa dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin
234b2(bi): du ma rungs pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / rul bar 'gyur pa dang / phung bar 'gyur pa dang / myag par
234b3(bi): 'gyur ba dang / lus la ma 'bar ba la sogs pa las/ de lta bu brjod pa yin/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar sems can bde ba thob pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang / klu//
234b4(bi): thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa 'di byin gyis brlabs zin gyis/ dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa klag pas grub pa/ bsgrub par ma byas par rig pa brjod pa tsam gyis mod la las byed pa
234b5(bi): yin te/ tshes grangs dang sbyar ba med/ skar ma dang sbyar ba med/ srung ba dang sbyar ba med par las 'di la bsgrub pa yang mi dgos/ de la las byed par 'dod na/ khro bo rgyal po dang brjod/
234b6(bi): pa 'ab tra zhig tu zad do// de nas khro bo chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyi snying po mi zad pa'o// khro bo dang klu thams cad kyi srog 'phrog pa/ drag po chen po dang ldan pa/
234b7(bi): klu thams cad kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM sU ta sru ta/ ma hA kro d+ha hUM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po'i dam tshig chen po phyi bsgrub kyi yang snying las
235a1(bi): thams cad pa'i gzungs brjod ma thag tu klu chen po dang / brang gis 'gro ba'i klu dang / ny+dza'i klu dang / grul bum gyi rdzu dang / sa sbyin gyi klu dang / 'byung po'i
235a2(bi): klu dang / sprul pa'i klu dang / skyong mo'i klu dang / sbrul gyi klu dang / klu rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gdol pa can dang / gnyen gyi
235a3(bi): klu dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang / klu'i rgyal po parma chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po thod chung dang /
235a4(bi): klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po ba su ta ka dang / klu'i rgyal po sa na drang / klu'i rgyal po dag sha ka dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / bra za ba la sogs pa'i klu
235a5(bi): de dag thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel nas sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngo // de nas phyogs bcu nas klu rnams nye bar rings par 'ongs nas/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis
235a6(bi): sna drangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces klu'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ phyag na rdo rjes sngags bshad pa ni mi bzad pa lags te//
235a7(bi): 'byung po thams kyad kyis bzod par dka' ba/ 'chi ba dbyug pa stobs po che lags so// zhes gsol ho// yang sog ma med kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
235b1(bi): bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su gsol to// dam tshig la yang bdag gi bu dang bcas/ gnyen dang gzhon pa dang bcas ha gnas par bgyi'o// bdag bde ba la gnas par
235b2(bi): bgyid do// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che mgon lags te/ dpung dang bcas te bzhon pa dang bcas pa gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// gang dang gang du khro bo chen po'i snying po
235b3(bi): klog pa dang / dran pa dang / ming tsam 'dzin pa 'chi ba'i sgo nas kyang / bdag gi stobs dang bcas/ gzhon pa dang bcas pas gnod pa bgyid mi nus so// yongs su
235b4(bi): skyab pa'i phyi re kun hu dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ ban+yA da gtang bar bgyi'o// lo tog dang / ma tog dang / 'bras bu smin cing rgyas par bgyi'o// thams cad du hUM zhes brjod
235b5(bi): pa tsam gyis las bgyi'o// dam tshig can gang na gnas par yang gnod sdig mi bgyid do zhes gsol pa dang / de nas yang klu mang po gzhan rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
235b6(bi): yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag nag la yang bskyabs su gsol/ dam tshig la yang bdag cag klu rnams bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ gnyen dang bcas te/
235b7(bi): bdag cag bde ba la gnas par bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che mgon lags te/ bu dang bcas pa gsum la skyabs su mchi'o// 'dir ri la gnas pa'i klu gzhan gzhon nu//
236a1(bi): gzhon nu gtum po klu mung pa'i nAdun dgra bgyid pa/ bdag cag klu gsan srog 'joms par bgyid pa'i dgra de dag bsal du gsol/ gang dang
236a2(bi): gang na khro ba'i snying po klu thams cad skrag par byed pa 'di klog pa dang / dran pa dang / ming tsam yang 'dzin pa mchis pa'i sgo nas kyang bdag cag klu rnams stobs dang bcas
236a3(bi): pa/ gzhon pa dang bcas bA gu nas der gnod sdig mi bgyid pa lags kyang / de thams cad dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do// yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir kun tu dus
236a4(bi): dus su char dbab par bgyi'o// bcu gtang bar bgyi'o// thams cad du hUM zhes brjod pas zhi bar bgyi'o// bdag gi dAm tshig bskyang bar bgyi'o// dam tshig can gang
236a5(bi): na gnas par yang gnod sdig mi bgyid do zhes klu gzhan gyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang klu gzhan rnams la bka' stsal
236a6(bi): pa/ klu'i bdag po dang klu mang po rnams lnga dam tshig smras pa de legs so// de de bzhin du byos shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na bcol ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi
236a7(bi): sems can thams cad skyab par gyis shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / rtsa ba dang / mgo phyogs
236b1(bi): drang / sman dang / nags tshul thams cad yongs su sbyang bar gyis shig/ klu'i rgyal po khyed la rjes su gdams pa ni 'di dag yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling rin+da po che sna bdun
236b2(bi): gyi rang bzhin du byas pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin+da no// zhes bka' stsal pas/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa klu de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom
236b3(bi): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ste dam tshig sngarA gsol ba las/ gzhan du bgyid cing rjes su
236b4(bi): mi bsgrub na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba slus par gyu ra cig/ lus ru la cing dri nga ba ra gyur rtsig/ dum
236b5(bi): bu lnga bcur 'jig par gyur cig/ da ma tshig nyams par gyur cig/ bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi thob par gyur cig/ ji ste bdag khro bo'i
236b6(bi): dam chog las 'gal bar byed n+da/ ri la gnas pa'i klu gzhon nu gtum po ma gtogs par/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa'i klu gzhan mang po dang bdag mi mthun
236b7(bi): par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ri la gnas pa'i klu gzhon nu gtum pa la bdag cag gis sdom pa sbyin mi nus so// zhes klu gzhan gyis gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i
237a1(bi): rgyal po de dag la legs so legs so// de bzhin du byos shig bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig pa
237a2(bi): 'dzin pa ni sngon ston pa mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du lta'o// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che dang mnyam pa dang 'dra ba ni/ bdag gis ma mthong ma 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
237a3(bi): gzungs brjod pa rnams la bdag gis rna ba'i bugs mnyan par bya'o// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa tsam gyis kyang bran gyi dngos po mchi bar bgyi'o// mthong bas sbyin par bgyi'o//
237a4(bi): char dbab pa'am/ mi dbab pa'am/ char chungs na ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// khro bo'am zhi ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras 'tshol bar bgyil
237a5(bi): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du lus bsgrub par bgyi la/ thams cad du klags pas 'grub pa 'am/ bla na med pa 'grub par bgyi'o// dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje gsor bar bgyi'o//
237a6(bi): rdo rje dang dril bu'i sgra brjod pa tsam gyis las thams cad bgyi'o// ci bsams pa 'am ci bcol ba'i las bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med nyid kyis/
237a7(bi): bcom ldan 'das dang / phyag na rdo rje la gsol pa/ bdag kyang gong du gsol pa las gzhan du mi bgyid do// bran dang / khol po dang / las mkhan bzhin du bgyis na/
237b1(bi): ston pa bcom ldan 'das dang phyag na rdo rje gnyis kyi sa byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag mnar med pa'i dmyal bar gyur cig/ 'on pa dang long bar gyur cig/ mdza can dang shu ba
237b2(bi): can du gyur cig/ mig nasu me 'bar bar gyur cig/ mgo a dza ga'i dog pa ltar 'gas par gyur cig/ lus rul zhing dring bar gyur cig/ de ltar ngam mnos pa bzhin las
237b3(bi): thams cad 'grub par bgyi'o// dus dus su char pa'i rgyun dbab par bgyi'o// sad dang / ser ba dang / rlung 'byung ba thams cad med par bgyi'o// ji srid du las 'bum
237b4(bi): byed par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes brjod pa'am/ rdo rje gsor ba 'am/ dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra brjod pa tsam la rna ba'i bu gas mnyan pa'i las bgyi'o// ston pa mngon par mthong ba
237b5(bi): dang 'dra bar rig pa 'dzin pa kun gyi las bgyi'o// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po mchod rten rgyud las/ sngon byung ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
237b6(bi): de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po gzhon nu gtum po de/ thugs rje dang ting nge 'dzin gyis sngon byung ba de ltar
237b7(bi): btul na/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad la/ mthu stobs des don bya ba'i ched du/ da rjes su bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rjes su bsgrub mi 'tshal lam zhe na/ de
238a1(bi): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsam to// dngal phyagran rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu gtum po dri/ sems can
238a2(bi): gyi don du rjes su bsgrub par bya'o// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan thugs rje can/ rjes bsgrub ji ltar sgrub ce na/ thabs cig mi 'tshal lam zhe na/ zhes gsol pa
238a3(bi): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje nyon cig/ klu'i rgyal po 'di byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed/ dbang drug cu rtsa gnyis kyang rdzogs par yang bsku
238a4(bi): rig pa' ya zhes kyang skyes nas// klu'i rgyal po yang ya nga gne du ba/ dungs par gyur/ 'khor ba la sko ba drag tu skyes nas/ bcos ldan 'das kyi zha bas la sge bos phyag byas
238a5(bi): nasabacom ldan 'das bdag rtsa ga sngar yang las ngan pa'i dbang gas zhe sdang gi ri gis klu ru skyes/ da lta ma rig pa'i dbang gis srid pa gsum la gnod pa yang byas pas/ ma rig pa'i
238a6(bi): dbang gis bgyis pa lags kyang / bdag mnar med pa'i dmyal bar mchi lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das dad pa skyes pa la brten nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes
238a7(bi): bzung la/ bdag bla na med pa'i sa la rdo rje 'chang chen po thob par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar thugs rje dang byin gyi rlabs kyis gzung bar bgyi'o// zhes gsol pa/
238b1(bi): bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de la legs so legs so// de ltar yin gyis kyang / khyod 'gyod sems drag tu skyes pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / dbang bskur
238b2(bi): ba dang / ye shes skyes pa dang / khyod sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyang ngas bstan pa 'di la las 'bum gyis la/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i las gyis shig/ khyod phyi ma'i tshe
238b3(bi): phyi ma'i dus na rgyal ba byams pa'i bstan pa la/ sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpar skye bar bya'o zhes gsungs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po yang dga' bas rgyas par gyur
238b4(bi): nas/ las thams cad rjes su bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po las 'bum byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
238b5(bi): zhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen po/ snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs la rjes sgru ba rim pa bshad du
238b6(bi): gsol/ las kyi gtso bo du tsam bdog/ las kyi bye brag ji ltar la gsu// bdag gis ma 'tshal bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sa/ snying rje'i ting
238b7(bi): ngange 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ da pa la phyag na rdo rje la lags so de legs so// rjes bsgrub las kyi ra mi pa bsha da// las kyi gtso bo rnam lnga ste// las kyi bye brag bsam
239a1(bi): thag cad// de nas phyag na rdo rje yis// las chen lnga po ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
239a2(bi): pa/ bsnyen pa bsgrub dang klu bsgrub dang // tha ma gnan pa gsod dang gsum// dbul ba yAng phyi ra ga te ra bsgrub ba zhi// se ma sa r+yan pha na ga dgas na da ga so lnga// bde
239a3(bi): gshes 'dus pa'i las chen po// gnyen po dang po sgrub pa ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// nyon cig dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje// gnyen po la yang
239a4(bi): rnam gnyis te// phyi sgrub dus su phyag na rdo rje ste// nang sgrub dus su bya khyung ga ru Ta'o// gsang sgrub dang po bshad par bya// dang po nyams dga' sa phyogs bya// rgyas pa'i
239a5(bi): gtor ma mnyam bzhag la// ba'i lngas mdzes maN+Dal bsham// spos drang tsan da na dri yis dgang / khrus dang gtsang sbras lus rgyas bya// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas kyang //

239a7(bi): pa'i sgra brjod pas// bdag nyid rdo rje rtse dgur bsgom// de nyid spro dang bsdu byas nas// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// badz+ra pA Ni'i sgra brjod pas// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje
239b1(bi): sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu 'phyar// g.yon pa dril bu dku ru brtan// sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar// dbu skra ser po rkyen
239b2(bi): du'abar// zhabs gnyis bgrad pas klu rnams gnon// lus la klu lnga'i rgyan gyis brgyan// mgo la rgyal rigs sbrul dkar khra// ske la bram ze sbrul ser khra// dpung la rje rigs

239b4(bi): hUM yang sgom// de zer las byung phyag na rdo rje'i sku// snga ma ji bzhin spyan drangs la// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// de nas gsang sgrub snying po bzlas// na mo rat+na tra ya
239b5(bi): yAn maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ya/ ma hU yak+ShA se nA pa ta ye/ oM tsaN+Da be ga ba re b+ha/ sa ra sa ra bi ri/ tu tu tu mu la sa ma ya bi ri/ hu ru hu ru hUM/ ti Sha hi ShA b+ho b+ho pan/ nA ga nan/ d+ha pra ma
239b6(bi): hA ra tu/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dza sU ta sU ta/ bai re bai re/ sa ra sa ra man ta tu ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ting 'dzin ma nyams gsang sngags bzlas/ klu rgyal chen po bsgrub par bya'o// srid
239b7(bi): gsum 'byung po rdul du rlog/ slar 'dus rang gi hUM la bstim// bdag nyid gzi mdangs bskyed par bya'o// 'bum mam bye bar brjod par bya// gsang sgrub bsgrubs rtags byung
240a1(bi): ba dang // byi bsgrub nang bsgrub gsang sngags bzlas/ klu rgyal chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas skabs su mchod pa dang // gtor ma dag

240b6(bi): gnas ris stong zhing brlag ga re// de ltar klu rnams bka' las ma 'da' zhig/ nga yis bka' las 'das gyur na// nam mkha' lding gi rgyal pos zos par 'chi'o//
240b7(bi): de nas rbad pa'i sngags kyang bzlas// oM ra tsa ma hA ga ru Da/ khyung rba hu ra hu ra b+h+yo/ 'di ni gsang sngags bcu gsum pa'o// yi ge chad na nus pa med// drag na klu rnams skrag

241b1(bi): gnas dgag na skye rgyud 'chad// min na ma drang sring mo 'chi// 'di yang khyad par las lnga yin// rmongs pa phal gyi spyod yul min// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag nu rdo

242a3(bi): zhes brjod pas// bud+d+ha mchod sems can gyi don byas// bdag nyid sgrib pa byang / bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/

242b1(bi): nyid bskyed par bya'o// mdun du bAm las ban d+ha ni// btsom gser 'dra'i rnam pa bskyed// de yi nang du yi ge phuH/ ser po gsal bar bsgom par
242b2(bi): bya/ de spro bsdu bya 'od du zhu bas// nA ga zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pas// gur kum mdog 'dra'i sbrul se ra po// lus po gcig la mgo bo bdun pa// ban d+ha gang bar
242b3(bi): bzhugs par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// mahA nA ga rA dza'i sgras// sngags kyi bdag po'i sku bskyed do// gzugs mdzes byis pha chung ngun gyi// cha byad gser gyi
242b4(bi): mdog tu gnas// sku tshad bcu drug sor dang ldan// ro stod mi la ro slad ni// gdug pa sbrul du 'khyi'u par bskyed// sbrul mgo bdun gyi ga deng kas mdzes// zur phud

242b6(bi): sku/ snga ma ji bzhin gzugs kyi sngos// ma dros mtshonas spyan drangs la// snga ma'i gzugs la gnyis med bstim// de las kyi zhig bya zer// mdun na bka' ni
242b7(bi): sdod pa la// bran dang khol po las mkhan dang // g.yog po'i tshul du gyis shig pa'am// bgegs la sogs pa tshar gcod pa// bka' bsgo'i rim pa sna tshogs bya/
243a1(bi): de nas klu li snying po bzlas// oM phu ha ru ta mahA kro d+ha hUM/ sid d+hi sid d+hi/ s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swAhA/ las dag grangs med lus la 'jug na 'bum/

243a3(bi): gzhan bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ sol// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa bshad pa legs// kye kye bcom ldan 'das bsnyen
243a4(bi): pa la yang du tsam bdog/ bsnyen pa'i bsgrub lugs ji ltar lags// bdag gis mi 'tshal bshad du gsol// legs so dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje// khyod la nga yis

243b1(bi): khru gang tshad ldan khri rtsigs la// steng du pad+ma 'dab brgyad bya// de steng tshad ldan bdag gis ni// sku mchog mdzes pa brtsigs par bya'o// phyi rol g.yam khang gru bzhi rtsigs//

243b3(bi): dang gting rings khron pa'i chu// klu rgyal klu yi rgyu ru bshad// mdzes pa'i sku mchog bzhengs nas kyang // rin chen gser chus sku mchog bsgyur// shar lho
243b4(bi): mtshams su nya gdong bzhag/ lho nub mtshams su rta ga dong bzhag/ nub byang mtshams su mar ka ta// byang shar mtshams su se mdzes so// de rnams dkar ser
243b5(bi): dmar sngo mdog/ dar dang za 'og gur kyang dbu ba// gser dngul zangs lcags byu ru sogs// gtor ma rgyas dang spos sogs kyis// khang bu'i nang yang dgang
243b6(bi): bar bya// bdag gzhan bskyed cing bstan pa drangs// skyabs su gtor ma gtang zhing bskul tshig stod// spos dud gtang zhing sngags bdag kyang // nyin gsum mtshan
243b7(bi): gsum sbyor ba yis// bod cing las bcol dam bdar ro// de nas klu rgyal dngos su bsgrug/ ci 'dod las kyang byed par 'gyur/ bris sku'i tshul du bsgrub pa mi
244a1(bi): gtsang ma'i ras la mchod rten ni// khru gang mtho glang sor drug tshad// mdzes par bris la dbus su ni// sngags bdag rgyal po tshad ldan bri// bri ba
244a2(bi): gzugs la yang rnam gnyis te// sku tshad bcu drug sor dag la// ro stod mi la ro smad ni// gdug pa sbrul du 'khyil ba las// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdeng kas mdzes//
